abstract: A confrontation at the Occupy Wall Street protests on Friday, which was captured on tape, has put a deputy inspector under the spotlight, and raised complaints that he had struck a protester in the early days of the demonstrations.
snippet: A confrontation at the Occupy Wall Street protests on Friday, which was captured on tape, has put a deputy inspector under the spotlight, and raised complaints that he had struck a protester in the early days of the demonstrations.
lead_paragraph: As a few hundred protesters went on a raucous march through the financial district last Friday, several camera operators recorded a jarring image.

headline.main: For Commander Tied to Punching Incident, Evidence of a Blow Weeks Earlier
